hero.description: 24-year-old software developer from India, am a full-stack dev, drink instant coffee, and get coding advice from my dog, Zara.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I've always had a deep fascination with technology. My journey began in childhood when I repaired my grandmother's phone and continued through my school years, fixing my own PC and helping friends with theirs for free. This early exposure to troubleshooting and repairing computers led me to start a small business, charging for my repair services, which further fueled my passion for systems and gaming. My interest in tech expanded when I began building gaming PCs for others, merging my love for gaming and hardware. This passion drove me to think bigger, focusing on scalable and high-availability systems and servers.

certifications.python: Python Course Certification: Mastering the Essentials

maticz.description: full-stack dev worked on mern stack and golang projects
points: Built and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js (Express) and Python (FastAPI), ensuring high performance and scalability
Designed and developed reusable, responsive UI components using ReactJS and Redux, improving code maintainability and reducing UI defects.
Enhanced API response times by implementing a Redis-based caching mechanism, reducing average latency significantly.
Integrated BullMQ and Kafka to enable asynchronous processing and distributed message handling, reducing CPU load by 60%.
Implemented secure and scalable file storage using AWS S3, and optimized content delivery with CloudFront CDN to reduce file access latency globally.
Built and integrated NFC keycard support in a React Native application using native modules, enabling secure contactless authentication and improving user experience.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers and clients to translate business requirements into high-quality, user-friendly features.

freelance.title: Computer Services and Video Editor
freelance.description: deep passion for technology and creativity, I offer a unique blend of computer services and video editing expertise. I enjoy solving technical challenges, whether it's troubleshooting computer issues, optimizing systems, or providing digital solutions that streamline workflows

footer.copy: Feel free to copy. If you need any help, ping me!
